 2014-12442014-11-06HC,  EC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectProducts Containing Mercury Regulations
PrecisPRODUCTS CONTAINING MERCURY REGULATIONS in order to protect human health and the environment by reducing releases of mercury from products used in Canada to the lowest level that is technically and economically feasible.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0254 Publication Date: 2014-11-19
